lines:
20 na wens auch Byfield,

6 h

Klammer Read

My dear Non Stones:

I would like 
to have you send me 
ter dollars for the subscription 
of the Athletic Association 
and sme less of thera 
as my pocket money, 
And much abliged to 
you.

pery sincent

May 25

5. 6. Lull

metadata.abstract: Letter requesting $10 for his membership in the Athletic Association.
